long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an action button to your browser that works with the Realitní Radar located at realitniradar.cz.
By clicking the action button, you can jump directly from a listing opened on sreality.cz to its version on the scraper website at Realitní Radar.
